content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with drop position at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -48.5) (empty)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) with iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (-13.5, -49.5) (empty)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates

### Coal Processing and Storage Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with drop position at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) for smelting
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5) containing iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (44.5, -80.5) containing coal and iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (45.5, -80.5) containing coal and iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (47.5, -80.5) containing coal and iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (49.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) containing coal
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5) for transferring items between chests and furnaces

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting from Storage
- Ensure that the storage entity is not empty before attempting to extract items. Check the inventory status of the storage entity to avoid extraction errors.

### Errors when Clearing Drop Chests
- Verify that the drop chest is not full before attempting to clear it. Regularly monitor and empty the chest to maintain continuous mining operations.

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
